Articles.Content: I play on playstion 4 and don’t know what the controls are for timewarping when I’m doing a burn ( in orbit or other places). I play with the curser controls. Yes I already know how to timewarp using R1 and circle or square. But what about the other timewarp like when you’re coming into kerbin’s atmosphere? I don’t know what the controls are for that. I can’t use that type of timewarp, using the same controls, when I want to land on the Mun.

@JoeKerbalGuy I play on Xbox and I think it’s the same as PS4 but on Xbox you cannot warp during a burn. Correct me if I am wrong as I have only been doing sstos to Easter eggs around kerbin for the past week or two.
